amendment.description: An amendment numbered 87 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds made available by this Act may be used to issue any new rule related (1) regarding the number of owners of an animal for purposes of the custom slaughter exemption of the Food Safety and Inspection Service; (2) limiting the persons that may own an animal; or (3) requiring custom operators to keep records.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
